name: Blank pseudo-class
description: This `blank` pseudo-class selects user inputs without any content. If you are looking to match empty elements, [`:empty`](https://css4-selectors.com/selector/css3/structural-pseudo-class/#empty 'CSS3: Structural pseudo class :empty') is the corresponding selector.
example_description: In this example just the second textarea and the second input will get matched as it has no content.
